alert.note: Alert for South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 1:46AM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Storm total snow accumulations between 8 and 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph with areas of blowing snow. Snow gradually tapers in intensity later this evening through Saturday morning. * WHERE...The Mountains of Summit County, the Mosquito Range, and the Indian Peaks. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact travel into Saturday morning, although the most difficult travel can be expected today through early this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip. org

area.areaDesc: South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
